tool_plan.objective: Determine one choice to recommend (ex-post blind) for the Aave proposal 0xa2b9d0717a82a111acc27e514bed07caa9b8636c12dd68fb61ae4dc57503c3cd, analyzing voting timeline and on-chain holder distribution.

calls.why: Fetch proposal meta including start and end timestamps for timeline analysis.
Analyze the voting timeline and participation metrics to understand voting dynamics.
Resolve governance token address to analyze holder distribution.
Compute total holders and top-100 holder distribution/concentration for on-chain analysis.

tool_plan.notes: Proposal metadata start and end timestamps approximated as the event start and end in UNIX seconds for timeline analysis. Votes sample used as a seed for timeline analysis. Token address authoritative from input. Holder analysis to understand voting power concentration.

decision.summary: The proposal to deploy Aave v3 on Plasma is supported by expert risk analysis and community discussion. Despite early-stage network risks, the proposal passed with strong community backing and no critical blockers identified.
key_arguments_for: Plasma offers high performance, zero-fee USDâ‚® transfers, and a robust Bitcoin bridge.
Expert risk assessments from LlamaRisk and ChaosLabs support proceeding with the deployment.
Significant liquidity commitments and ecosystem support are planned.
Testnet deployments show positive activity and interest.
key_arguments_against: Plasma is a novel and early-stage network with no public mainnet yet.
Limited on-chain data and audits available.
Potential technical and security risks remain unquantified.
Token distribution centralization risk for XPL native token.

evidence.quote: Proposal [ARFC] Deploy Aave v3 on Plasma with choices YAE, NAY, Abstain; start 2025-09-06T09:37:23Z, end 2025-09-09T09:37:23Z.
Expert analysis from LlamaRisk and ChaosLabs supporting deployment with caution; network in early stages.
No governance token resolved; authoritative token address from input used.

references.title: Discussion on ARFC Deploy Aave v3 on Plasma
